</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a0094a84.1503">   <title>: International Opportunities Fund - Announcement of opportunity: April 2015 call </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a0094a84.1503</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>International Opportunities Fund - Announcement of opportunity: April 2015 call<br><br>Closing date for full proposals 30 April 2015 at 16:00 BST<br><br>The Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) is inviting proposals to its International Opportunities Fund (IOF). The IOF scheme provides resources to NERC-supported researchers to allow them to forge long-term partnerships with overseas scientists that add value to current NERC-funded science. IOF grants are pump-priming, to help stimulate novel research collaborations. Mature research collaborations should apply to NERC's Standard or Large Grant schemes, which allow for overseas project partnerships, or to other appropriate sources of funding. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T11:55:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a0094a84.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;deabd151.1503">   <title>Four Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;deabd151.1503</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. Call now open for NERC Centre for Doctoral Training 2015<br><br>2. Public consultation on the ex-post evaluation of FP7<br><br>3. Innovation Funding Opportunity: Cleaner, More Efficient Conventional Fuels<br><br>4. Vacancy: Research Scientist in Monsoons<br><br>1. Call now open for NERC Centre for Doctoral Training 2015<br><br>NERC CDT: The use of smart and autonomous observation for the environmental sciences [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T17:43:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;deabd151.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f6f7b3b3.1503">   <title>Three Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f6f7b3b3.1503</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. Managing the environment to improve human health &amp; wellbeing<br><br>The Valuing Nature Programme is inviting interested parties to contribute to the shaping of its forthcoming Health &amp; Wellbeing call - to be announced in May 2015 - by completing the an online survey (deadline March 13th) - https://www.research.net/r/VNP-health-call-responses. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T18:20:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f6f7b3b3.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f616c34e.1503">   <title>Strategic Research Impact Scheme Launch - Reminder to register </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f616c34e.1503</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Strategic Research Impact Scheme Launch - Reminder to register<br><br>The launch of NERC's new Strategic Research Impact Scheme is taking place on Tuesday 17th March 2015 in London.<br><br>This event will provide academics and users of NERC science with information about the upcoming call for the Strategic Research Impact Scheme and facilitate the generation of ideas for collaborative projects. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-02T16:51:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;f616c34e.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dec9bedf.1502">   <title>International Summer School on Global Greenhouse Gases </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dec9bedf.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>International Summer School on Global Greenhouse Gases<br><br>16-23 August 2015, Edinburgh, UK<br><br>This intensive 8-day course is aimed at advanced PhD students and post-doctoral researchers in the natural sciences who want to develop a solid understanding of the role of key greenhouse gases (GHGs) in the Earth system and the processes that govern their dynamics in the atmosphere, ocean and biosphere. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-24T18:01:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dec9bedf.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;40297750.1502">   <title>Supporting Climate Change </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;40297750.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Supporting Climate Change Research<br><br>NERC has recently received details of the UAE Research Program for Rain Enhancement Science which will be awarding $5million in grants for research programmes into rain enhancement. The funding is part of a focus on addressing the growing issue of water security that is coming under even greater pressures as a result of global water use increasing at twice the rate of population growth.<br>The $5million will be split between up to five projects, which are required to submit outline proposals by Monday 16th March 2015. Public or private, non-profit or for-profit [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-19T12:35:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;40297750.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;9d3c3.1502">   <title>Impact Awards for KE & Commercialisation Professionals Opens for Entries </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;9d3c3.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Impact Awards for KE &amp; Commercialisation Professionals Opens for Entries<br>NERC, along with RCUK and PraxisUnico, are delighted to announce their collaboration on the Impact Awards 2015, celebrating the outstanding work of Knowledge Exchange, Technology Transfer and Commercialisation Teams (KEC) across the UK.<br>The Impact Awards highlight best practice and innovative approaches to KEC in UK research organisations and beyond, showcasing the vital contribution made by KEC professionals in developing excellent research into tangible, real-life benefits to society and business. NERC, RCUK and PraxisUnico are working together to highlight how the excellent work being done in [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T11:33:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;9d3c3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;de424d4.1502">   <title>Two Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;de424d4.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. European Commission workshop &quot;A European Roadmap for Climate Services&quot;, Brussels, 17 March 2015<br><br>This Commission workshop is the first public occasion to present the European Roadmap for Climate Services to stakeholders and key players in the field, share views and experiences on key issues, discuss the challenges and opportunities, and move towards its implementation. It is aimed in particular at organisations that either produce or supply climate information and intelligence, or are interested as actual or potential users of climate services. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-17T11:41:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;de424d4.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;89e88b13.1502">   <title>Two Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;89e88b13.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. Atmospheric Pollution and Human Health in a Developing Megacity Announcement of Opportunity: India workshop<br><br>NERC is inviting applications from UK scientists to attend a joint workshop with the Indian Ministry of Earth Science (MoES) in Delhi on 11-13 May 2015 on Atmospheric Pollution and Human Health in an Indian Megacity.<br>The Announcement of Opportunity document as well as full details of the invitation and how to apply can be found at :<br>http://www.nerc.ac.uk/research/funded/programmes/atmospollution/news/ao-indiaworkshop/ [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T14:43:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;89e88b13.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;49eab7ed.1502">   <title>NERC Marine Listserver: Two Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;49eab7ed.1502</link>   <description> NERC Marine Listserver<br><br>1. EU survey on Earth observation in a global context<br><br>Have your say on how to make the most out of Earth observation!<br><br>The Earth's atmosphere, oceans and landscapes are changing rapidly, with human activities being a major driver. Monitoring and modelling these changes are critical because they allow governments, society and the private sector to make informed decisions about climate, energy, food security, natural hazards, health and other societal challenges. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-09T17:33:45+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;49eab7ed.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;d6330330.1502">   <title>Two Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;d6330330.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. EU survey on Earth observation in a global context<br><br>Have your say on how to make the most out of Earth observation!<br><br>The Earth's atmosphere, oceans and landscapes are changing rapidly, with human activities being a major driver. Monitoring and modelling these changes are critical because they allow governments, society and the private sector to make informed decisions about climate, energy, food security, natural hazards, health and other societal challenges. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-09T17:27:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;d6330330.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b1affde6.1502">   <title>New funding opportunity: ESRC Centre for evaluating complexity </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b1affde6.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Funding opportunity: Centre for evaluating complexity across the energy-environment-food nexus:<br>The Economic and Social Research Council has launched a call (http://www.esrc.ac.uk/funding-and-guidance/funding-opportunities/33584/centre-for-evaluating-complexity-across-the-energy-environment-food-nexus.aspx) with funding partners Natural Environment Research Council (NERC), Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra), Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC), Environment Agency (EA) and Food Standards Agency (FSA) for a new research centre to address the challenges associated with evaluating complexity. The overarching aim of the Centre will be to pioneer, test and promote innovative and inclusive methods to analyse evaluations across the energy-environment-food nexus where complexity presents an integral challenge to [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T14:59:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b1affde6.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b9c7ad9e.1502">   <title>Two Announcements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b9c7ad9e.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>1. ANNOUNCEMENT OF OPPORTUNITY: HIGHLIGHT TOPICS FEBRUARY 2015<br>Closing date: 9 April 2015<br><br>2. Hoskins@70: Meteorology - what is the forecast?<br><br>University of Reading 17-18 June 2015<br><br>ANNOUNCEMENT OF OPPORTUNITY: HIGHLIGHT TOPICS FEBRUARY 2015<br>Closing date: 9 April 2015<br><br>NERC invites proposals for the first round of highlight topics, a new route for funding strategic research. Highlight topics focus strategic research on defined topic areas, and will be delivered through independent projects. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-05T16:28:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;b9c7ad9e.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;54c303e1.1502">   <title>Big Data for Resilience: realising the benefits for developing countries - Scoping exercise call </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;54c303e1.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Announcement of Opportunity:<br>Big Data for Resilience: realising the benefits for developing countries - Scoping exercise call<br>Closing date 2nd March 2015<br><br>This scoping exercise is part of the new Science for Humanitarian Emergencies and Resilience (SHEAR) programme. The programme aims to enable greater and more effective investment in disaster resilience and earlier action to respond to natural hazards by: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T11:43:25+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;54c303e1.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dc6b3bac.1502">   <title>Call for evidence to inform NERC's investment priorities for the next Comprehensive Spending Review period </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dc6b3bac.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Call for evidence to inform NERC's investment priorities for the next Comprehensive Spending Review period<br>This year NERC expects to participate in a spending review that sets budgets for government departments, and ultimately research councils, for 2016-2020. A call for evidence has been launched which will inform decisions as to how NERC can most effectively invest in environmental science and innovation to continue to support UK priorities, balancing society's need to benefit from environmental resources whilst managing our environment responsibly.<br>All the detail and how to respond can be found on the NERC website&lt;http://www.nerc.ac.uk/about/whatwedo/engage/engagement/priorities/&gt;.<br>This call [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T17:23:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;dc6b3bac.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a2f2d1f.1502">   <title>DFID Research Advisory Group Vacancies for DFID recruitment - now live </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a2f2d1f.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>DFID Research Advisory Group Vacancies for DFID recruitment - now live<br><br>2 new posts for the DFID Research Advisory Group (RAG) in Humanitarian Research and Education Research. Details can be found on the DFID page at GOV.uk : https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-international-development/about/recruitment#current-vacancies<br><br>Summary of the advert can be found below (closing date for application is 12th Feb 2015).    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T10:59:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;a2f2d1f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;5d0db562.1502">   <title>New Frontiers in Submillimetre-Wave and Far-Infrared Atmospheric Science: FINAL ANNOUNCEMENT OF AN OPEN WORKSHOP </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;5d0db562.1502</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>New Frontiers in Submillimetre-Wave and Far-Infrared Atmospheric Science<br><br>FINAL ANNOUNCEMENT OF AN OPEN WORKSHOP<br><br>Churchill College, University of Cambridge, UK, 10th February, 2015<br><br>Please see the attached announcement for more information.<br><br>[cid:image003.png@01D03642.FCFAA310]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-02T18:18:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Curlett, Sarah L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;5d0db562.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;4a71f309.1501">   <title>Introduction to NERC Marine Planning and the National Marine Facilities Sea Systems </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-ATMOS;4a71f309.1501</link>   <description> NERC Atmospheric Sciences Listserver<br><br>Don't forget to register for one or both sessions.<br><br>Introduction to NERC Marine Planning and the National Marine Facilities Sea Systems<br>Registration now open - Email deso@nerc.ac.uk&lt;mailto:deso@nerc.ac.uk&gt; to register for one or both sessions<br><br>On Wednesday 4th February 2015, NERC Marine Planning and the National Marine Facilities Sea Systems will be at NOC Liverpool holding two open sessions for parties interested in using/or already using the facility.
